content: I've been trying to invest in more timeless pieces lately, so I think I'll aim to spend around $100-$200 on a good quality denim jacket. I've had good experiences with Levi's in the past, so I might check out their selection. By the way, speaking of Levi's, I recently bought a pair of their high-waisted, dark blue jeans, and I'm really happy with them. I spent around $80 on them, which is a bit more than I wanted to spend, but I know they'll last a long time. And, on a related note, I also got a pair of Adidas sneakers recently for $50, which was a steal!
